alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Middlesex; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 14 at 6:00PM EDT until April 14 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL MERCER...SOUTHEASTERN SOMERSET AND MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Old Bridge, or 7 miles southeast of New Brunswick, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Somerset, Edison, Old Bridge, East Brunswick, South Brunswick, Sayreville, North Brunswick, Middlesex, Princeton, Bound Brook, Jamesburg, Cranbury, Rocky Hill, Millstone, Princeton Meadows, Kingston, Dayton and Plainsboro Center. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike between exits 9 and 12. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 66 and 68. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 12. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 121 and 132. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
